case.name: SZGTH v Minister for Immigration & Multicultural Affairs [2006] FCA 1801 (21 December 2006)

citphrases.citphrase: appeal from decision of federal magistrate
inconsistent evidence given by appellant's spouse
grounds of appeal raise no jurisdictional error

whether s 424a of the migration act 1958 (cth) required the refugee review tribunal to give written notice to the first appellant of its intention to rely on adverse information provided by the second appellant
refugee review tribunal exempt from providing notice

legistitles.title: MIGRATION ACT 1958
MIGRATION ACT 1958 - SECT 424A Information and invitation given in writing by Tribunal
